top.title: Brigitte Bardot: The blonde bombshell who revolutionised French cinema
top.summary: The cocktail of kittenish charm and continental sensuality who swept away the cinematic cobwebs of the 1950s.

top.title: Polls close on first day of Myanmar's widely criticised 'sham' election
top.summary: Observers say the vote, accompanied by a renewed crackdown on dissent, is meant to entrench the junta's power.

top.title: Zelensky says Russia 'doesn't want peace', ahead of Florida meeting with Trump
top.summary: The pair are expected to discuss territorial concessions and security guarantees during the negotiations.

top.title: UK social media campaigners among five denied US visas
top.summary: The Trump administration bans five people who have called for tech regulation from entering the country.

top.title: TikTok removes AI weight loss ads from fake Boots account
top.summary: The adverts for prescription-only drugs showed healthcare professionals impersonating the British retailer.

top.title: Call of Duty co-creator Vince Zampella dies in California car crash
top.summary: The influential video game developer died after his car crashed and caught fire on a highway in Los Angeles.
